mapper.select: SELECT ENTRY_ID AS entryId, USER_ID AS userId, MEAL_NAME AS mealName, TO_CHAR(EAT_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS mealTime, TO_CHAR(EAT_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS') AS eatTime, CALORIES_KCAL AS calories, PROTEIN_G AS protein, CARBS_G AS carbs, FATS_G AS fat FROM MEAL_ENTRY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND TRUNC(EAT_TIME) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY EAT_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEAL_ENTRY ( USER_ID, MEAL_NAME, EAT_TIME, CALORIES_KCAL, PROTEIN_G, CARBS_G, FATS_G ) VALUES ( #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mealName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{eatTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), #{calories, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{protein, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{carbs, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fat, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT ENTRY_ID AS entryId, USER_ID AS userId, MEAL_NAME AS mealName, TO_CHAR(EAT_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS mealTime, TO_CHAR(EAT_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD\"T\"HH24:MI:SS') AS eatTime, CALORIES_KCAL AS calories, PROTEIN_G AS protein, CARBS_G AS carbs, FATS_G AS fat FROM MEAL_ENTRY WHERE ENTRY_ID = #{entryId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEAL_ENTRY SET MEAL_NAME = #{mealName}, EAT_TIME = TO_TIMESTAMP( TO_CHAR(EAT_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || #{mealTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI' ), CALORIES_KCAL = #{calories}, PROTEIN_G = #{protein}, CARBS_G = #{carbs}, FATS_G = #{fat} WHERE ENTRY_ID = #{entryId}
